mapper.select:
Select yp.exec_time as year_plan_exec_time, s.id, company_name, man, phone, address from customer s left join month_plan a ON position(concat(s.id) in a.customer_ids) != 0 left join year_plan yp on a.year_plan_id = yp.id
and ${result} (Select 1 from result f where f.month_id = a.id and f.customer_id = s.id) and yp.id is not null
